author: acmurthy
msg: MAPREDUCE-4328. Add a JobTracker safemode to allow it to be resilient to NameNode failures. The safemode can be entered either automatically via the configurable background thread to monitor the NameNode or by the admin. In the safemode the JobTracker doesn't schedule new tasks, marks all failed tasks as KILLED for future retries and doesn't accept new job submissions.
